# Copilot Instructions

<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This is a VS Code extension project. Please use the get_vscode_api with a query as input to fetch the latest VS Code API references.

## Project Overview
This project is a VS Code extension that implements a block breaker game using WebView panels. The game features:
- Canvas-based game rendering
- Ball physics and collision detection
- Paddle controls
- Block destruction mechanics
- Score tracking

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow VS Code extension best practices
- Implement proper WebView security measures
- Use modern HTML5 Canvas APIs for game rendering
- Ensure responsive game controls
